title: Keep Funding
description: Toggle to keep funding taken. Specify loan for unused funding and credit for used funding.

content.title: Loan and credit ID's
content.body: Loan or credit ID's can be retrieved throug the  [Funding Loans](https://docs.bitfinex.com/reference?showHidden=94bdb#rest-auth-funding-loans) and [Funding Credits](https://docs.bitfinex.com/reference?showHidden=94bdb#rest-auth-funding-credits) endpoints.
